D

data - Variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.FloodRoutingMsg
An array of DataPackets.
DataPacket - Class in net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting
This class serves as a base class for messages to be sent using the Routing Framework.
DataPacket() - Constructor for class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.DataPacket
 
DIRTY_AGING - Static variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.RoutingApplication
Only aging is required, no sending
DIRTY_CLEAN - Static variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.RoutingApplication
No action is needed for this routing application
DIRTY_SENDING - Static variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.RoutingApplication
Some packets are ready to be sent
display(Display) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Application
Every application has the ability to display its status, though it is not constrained in any way.
Display - Class in net.tinyos.prowler
Inherited from java.awt.Frame this class controls the graphical output of our experiments.
Display(Simulator, double) - Constructor for class net.tinyos.prowler.Display
A parameterized constructor of the Display class, creates a 800 by 800 square shaped area on the screen.
display(Display) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.floodrouting.FloodRouting
This calls the display method for all the linked RoutingApplications.
display(Display) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Node
The default implementation of the display function, calls the display funtions of the member applications.
display(Display) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.SelforganizingBackbones
 
display(Display) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.Simulator
Called by the Display whenever it is repainted, it calls the Node.display(net.tinyos.prowler.Display) method on every nodes in its Node list.
display(Display) - Method in class net.tinyos.prowler.TestBroadcastNode
Draws a filled circle, which is:
- blue if the node is sending a message
- red if the node received a corrupted message
- green if the node received a message without problems
- pink if the node sent a message
- and black as a default
It also draws a line between mote and its parent, which is another mote who sent the message first to this.
dynamicRandomFactor - Variable in class net.tinyos.prowler.GaussianRadioModel
This coefficient is used to "simulate" the dynamic part of environmental noise.
